traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: Can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: Ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 1 Piercing plus the target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) Poison damage.
